attributes.action: Permanently remove all NHS parking fees for staff on duty.
attributes.additional_details: After months of hard work, long hours, and feigned “gratitude” from the government, this would be an excellent gesture to staff of the NHS. It would have a real and lasting impact on the lives of those staff who have kept our country going in these challenging times.
attributes.background: A pledge to remove all charges for parking at NHS Hospitals in England, so they are the same as Wales and Scotland. This pledge should be guaranteed for the next 5 years.
